page.title: 04Public Library Dalgety Bay.
page.content: Above the Commercial Centre there is a small public library which has to cater for readers of all ages in Dalgety Bay.The largest part of the library is the adult novel section which is comprised of thrillers, romance,science fiction and historical novels.There is a small reference section for adults dealing mainly with cookery and gardening.The library provides plenty of attractive fiction books for young readers.However there is an inadequate supply of fiction for the 11-14 age group and the junior reference section is limited.The library,although small,is well-lit and furnished with comfortable chairs where children can browse through the books chosen.The library staff are very helpful for if a particular book is not in stock they will order it from Dunfermline Central Library.
